label: 廊
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: Of various forms, these covered passageways provided access to the different structures of a large dwelling complex, extending from the main house (shinden) or wings (tai) to and beyond gates, to supplementary buildings and subsidiary residences.  There could be rooms opening off them.[寝殿、対][RK]
